entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
